bibl.title: L.T. Savacool v. Territory of Washington. Petition
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

div1.p: Before the District Court of the Territory of Washington Wm G. Langford judge presiding at Chambers at Dayton Columbia County Territory of Washington
In the matter of L.T. Savacool habeas corpus vs J.H. Hosler

This cause coming on to be heard at chambers at Dayton Columbia County Territory of Washington on the 23d of February 1886, upon the application for the court and the return of J.H. Hosler and the said served appearing in his own proper person and by his attorney M.M. Gudman his attorney and the said J.H. Hosler by this attorney Robert T. Sturdevant and the case being submitted the court adjudges that the process upon which the said Savacool is held in defective and as justification for the imprisonment of him the said Savacool and therefore orders an examination made as of whether he the said Savacool is guility of any offense
for which he should be held in custody whereupon the evidence is submitted to the Court and upon the evidence and how the judge Wm G. Langford finds that there is is no probable cause to find him the said Savacool guilty of any such offense and it is hereby orderered that he the said Savacool be and he is hereby discharged from all custody and imprisonment to go hence without day and what the costs of the prosecution hence be freed by the County of Garfield of the Territory of Washington as per hereto attached

Miles fees C.A. McCabe 1 day and 50 miles $7 00 W.S Newland 1 " " " " " 7 00 Ben Butler 1 " " " " " 7 00
C.H. Seeley 1 " " " " " 7 00 J H Robinson 1 " " " " " 7 00 L P Mulkey 1 " " " " " 7 00 Josiah Butrain 1 " " " " " 7 00 W E Wilson 1 " " " " " 7 00 Dan Rice 1 " " " 2 " 2 20 D C Guernesy " " " " " 2 20 C R Dorr " " " " " 2 20
Sheriff Hoslers fees Boarding prisoner 8 days $8 00 Serving 4 subpoenas and 8 miles 2.40 For guarding prisoner 1 day 3.00

Clerk of Court fees Filing and entering Petition 60 Issuing Writ & Return 1.60 Docket and appearances .50 Deftsapp 25 Issuing 2 subpoenas and filing 1.20 Issuejoined 50 Taking and filing one affidavit .35 Entering 3 orders 1.50 Taxing costs .50 of this Garfield County 2 20
I R.F. Sturdevant prosecuting attorney of the Counties of Garfield Columbia and Assotin do hereby Certify that I have examined the foregoing Bill of costs and that the same is correct

I William G. Langford Judge of the First Judicial District of Washington Territory and the District Court of Columbia County W.T. holding terms at Dayton do hereby certify that I have examined the foregoing case Bill and find the same correct
